definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The deal was agreed last year and construction is expected to begin soon.
sentences.chinese: 这项输油管道协议去年达成，修筑工程预计很快开工。

sentences.english: Through this pipeline, crude oil flows from Daqing to Beijing in a steady stream.
sentences.chinese: 大庆石油通过这条输油管源源不断地流往北京。

sentences.english: The operation actualities of Mahuining oil pipeline is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了马惠宁输油管道的施工和投产后的运行现状。

sentences.english: An oil company plans to construct a east to west from the main pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 某石油公司计划建造一条由东向西的主输油管道。

sentences.english: In this paper, we set up a mathematical model on decorating the best oil pipelines routes.
sentences.chinese: 如何使输油管线建设费用最省，并对此建立数学模型。

sentences.english: This article covers a brief introduction about the test of overall heat transfer coefficient of Dongxin oil pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了东辛输油管道总传热系数的测试情况。

sentences.english: Water hammer is a sort of phenomenon of unsteady flow.
sentences.chinese: 水击是输油管道系统中经常出现的一种不稳定流现象。

sentences.english: The system has been widely applied in petroleum pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 该系统在输油管线上已得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the optimization and automation of line-up in piping systems of petroleum refinery.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论炼油厂输油管网调线的最优化与自动问题。

sentences.english: Fatigue any part of the pipeline wall thinning oil spills are likely to break.
sentences.chinese: 输油管管壁的任何部位疲劳变薄都有可能断裂漏油。

sentences.english: US will probably get rights to the oil pipeline from the Caspian sea though. The Great Game begins anew.
sentences.chinese: 不过，美国将有可能从里海的输油管道上获得好处。

sentences.english: The pipeline about Tie-in technology is the key to the entire oil and gas exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 其中，输油管道的回接技术又是整个油气开发的关键。

sentences.english: Villagers scavenging for fuel in Nigeria are blamed for setting off an inferno as gasoline gushing from a ruptured pipeline exploded.
sentences.chinese: 在尼日利亚，由于村民偷油，不慎引起输油管道爆炸。

sentences.english: Daqing-Harbin Pipeline passing Songhua River project has applied horizontal oriental drilling technology.
sentences.chinese: 庆哈输油管道工程穿越松花江应用了水平定向钻技术。

sentences.english: The lift-up and lie-down are the key operations during installation procedure of seabed pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 海底输油管线在敷设过程中需进行管线吊放作业。

sentences.english: Palm trees are everywhere but the country is riddled with oil pipelines, snaking down the roadside inches away from homes.
sentences.chinese: 到处有棕榈树，但是在这个国家输油管无处不在。

definition: oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
